title: 14a04 - WDOL.gov website.
text:
WDOL.gov (http://www.wdol.gov)
provides a single website for access to federal contract labor standards
information and wage determinations (WDs) issued under the SCA and the
Davis-Bacon Act (DBA). (See 29 C.F.R. 4.4(c).)
html:
Â 

WDOL.gov (http://www.wdol.gov) provides a single website for access to federal contract labor standards information and wage determinations (WDs) issued under the SCA and the Davis-Bacon Act (DBA). (See 29 C.F.R. 4.4(c).)
